channel.title: Visions
channel.description:
Come with me. Seems so slow. Freedom. Movement. Trying to not get high so freely. Each different pathway we take seems to flow back. To Us.
Let love to me, so the soul will glow I present to you gold I will play to you which that is god You cannot escape me Don't try to escape me
02:51:01 t4 | you've been lied to 02:51:15 t4 | we've never been alive to? 02:51:18 t4 | you've been lied to. 02:51:24 t4 | alive with you
I will be adding more as they come about.

item.title: Visions
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

the world is an alien landscape, filled with purple mushroom and black skybox creatures neon in colour inhabit this world the feed upon the rainbow worms that infest the soil a soil that was once filled with life similar to that which we see on earth a microcosm
massive amounts of vegetation in my eyelids an array of leeks and radishes broccoli, foliage, so green sticky dense forest
sitting during the summer in a classroom in the dark. feeling cold. light flickering, white light from the doors and windows. grey faces, stillness no motion. stuck in a moment. frozen in time.
earth shattering cosmic debris accelerating in the cosmos a giant sun, engulfing the earth glowing plasma humanity's destruction peace in the galaxy is achieved physics is law

Read full topic

item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

my balls stink
im starving
buti just brushed teeth
i can close my eyes
and make myself remember crystal clear images from my past
jesus
a black man’s head turned into a tomato
